text: Has this happened because it's a bookmarklet?

I'm not sure where to put this..
I'm creating a site for a client where their current template utilises jQuery 1.7.x loaded in by HubSpot from the dashboard.

I'm requiring my own jQuery (v3+) library in the new template which. The modules that utilise jQuery whilst in staging mode for the new template don't work 100% as it's trying to use jQuery 1..7.x

How do I stop this from clashing with the new template in staging as it's conflicting and the client thinks it doesnt work..

Hi everyone ! I'm stuck in an issue please help me to fix it.
I'm trying to submit a template pack for approval but while submitting, I'm getting below error message

Module may not work correctly in blog templates (Techblaze_Blog) (template Techblaze_Blog)

Please tell me why I'm getting this error message even if i delete the particular module.

Hey guys,
I am a Front End web developer, I am looking for certification in Digital Marketing. Which is the useful certification for developers if they want a career change into DM?
Hey - Digital marketing is quite a broad subject. Are you aware of any avenues you'd like to explore first or just want an overview first?
Hi All - i am looking for an easy way to convert the multiple checkbox into dropdown in the HubSpot form. any help would be greatly appreciated , thanking you in advance :slightly_smiling_face:
